function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"High requirement of technical personnel and high costs","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Residual disinfectants after disinfection","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relative narrow disinfection spectrum and complex impact factors","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper disposal of infectious and pathological wastes leading to disease transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate disinfection methods leading to incomplete destruction of toxic components","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of proper training and expertise in handling advanced disinfection technologies","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Improper disinfection of hospital wastes and wastewater","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of contaminated wastewater and sludge as agricultural fertilizer","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of qualified personnel for waste management and disposal","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of chlorine disinfection in hospital wastewater may result in chlorine-resistant pathogens.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Improper handling of infectious waste may lead to the spread of the sars-cov-2 virus.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper disinfection of hospital wastes may lead to the persistence of infectious materials.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited studies on sars-cov-2 inactivation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Prolonged survival of sars viruses in hospital wastewater and waste","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variable efficiency of ozone disinfection","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 through contaminated hospital waste and wastewater","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate studies on the inactivation of sars-cov-2","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Improper disposal of pharmaceutical wastes at sanitary landfills","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Discharge of chemical wastes into the drainage system","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper handling and disposal of radioactive wastes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper disposal of infectious wastes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper disinfection of disposable medical supplies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate disposal of pharmaceutical wastes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High temperature incineration may generate hazardous substances like dioxins during low temperature combustion","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mixing non-hazardous wastes with hazardous or infectious pollutants may require special disposal and disinfection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Different disinfection and disposal methods should be adopted based on unique characteristics of different hospital wastes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Introduction of new disinfection technologies may lead to improper implementation and potential errors in operation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inconsistent sterilization temperatures and fluctuation ranges may compromise the effectiveness of high temperature steam disinfection","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low volume reduction rate and generation of toxic volatile organic compounds during high temperature steam disinfection","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for inadequate disinfection due to lack of control over the inactivation process and moisture content","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misuse of conventional microwave units leading to ineffective disinfection","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential environmental pollution and health risks due to improper disposal of biohazardous wastes and toxic residues after disinfection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Infectious microorganisms surviving plasma incineration","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor treatment of hospital wastes with chemical disinfection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective physical disinfection using microwave technology","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete combustion due to excess air demand","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High investment costs for small and medium scale equipment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complicated maintenance and high maintenance costs","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High temperature incineration can release air pollutants and greenhouse gases","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper handling of explosive and radioactive waste in incineration can lead to safety hazards","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper waste preparation and incineration processes can result in incomplete destruction of pathogens","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate disinfection with uvc due to inadequate depth of penetration","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inappropriate selection of disinfection technologies for hospital waste","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential risks of ozone disinfection in wastewater treatment, including high operation costs and hazardous byproducts with chemical reactions. ozone over-dose can cause bad smell and secondary pollution.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential risks of using uv light in disinfection, including human exposure to hazardous uv radiation and incomplete disinfection of wastewater.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sodium hypochlorite disinfectant preparation may result in high energy consumption","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sodium hypochlorite disinfectant has strong corrosiveness","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sodium hypochlorite disinfectant poses a risk of higher pollution","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Chlorine leakage due to improper handling or storage","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficiency or ineffectiveness of chlorine dioxide as a disinfectant","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"}]}
